name: EquipRent
description: A peer to peer web application providing users a platform to rent/borrow equipment from other users (outdoors, camping, etc.).

name: Social Celeb
description: A social media data analytics web applciation providing information on likes and number of followers of social media influencers.

name: Tasteful
description: Tasteful is a food search app oferring the user a personal and custom search to satisfy their next craving. Tasteful matches descriptive keywords of the desired food and the userâ€™s personal food preferences resulting in a refined and precise search experience.
